snippet.title: Eddie Hill in the Curse of the Skull Medallion - Now Available !
snippet.description:
Now Available on Itch.io:
https://gameinaframe.itch.io/eddiehill-cosm

EDDIE HILL in The Curse of the Skull Medallion is an hardcore platformer inspired by  the likes of Celeste and Super Meat Boy.

In this adventure, Eddie must retrieve the Skull Medallion sitting atop a mountain walled by a perilous jungle and an ancient temple full of dangers.

The levels in this game were designed by students​ during a level design workshop I held  in March 2021.
